name: Virtual Cyber Technology
overview:
Virtual Cyber Technology is the professional virtual assistant firm that offers support services dedicated solely to the needs of recruitment firm and human resources department worldwide.

Virtual Cyber Technology VA’s can be the key ingredient in your recruiting team. VCT empowers clients by providing access to low cost, professional Virtual Assistants who are highly trained and experienced to serve the human resources department.

We are serving firms since 2005 and have helped our clients save thousands of dollars annually through reduction in costs and increased productivity. Our location in Mumbai, India gives you offshoring advantages by providing services at costs much lower than an in-house researcher.

Need assistance for only few hours daily? Get a Virtual Assistant.
